name: Bernard ROTHMAN, Petitioner, v. The COURT OF COMMON PLEAS OF DAUPHIN COUNTY, Pennsylvania, Respondent

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 5th day of February, 1990, the Application for Reargument is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:
